attributes.additional_details:
Liz Truss was not elected by the UK public and the people need to choose who will lead them in these unprecedented times.

Inflation is at the highest level in 40 years with no clear plan on how to address the cost-of-living crisis.

Oil and gas giants are expecting profits of £170bn whilst families will have to choose between heating or feeding their families. 

The people need to choose their leader - Truss should call a general election.
attributes.background: Liz Truss should call for a general election so that the citizens of the United Kingdom can choose their leader in these unprecedented times.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Call an immediate general election to end the chaos of the current government
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

Hold a General Election within 100 days of the new PM being appointed
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/621931

If a Prime Minister resigns a general election should be called
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
